attributes.action: Reverse the decision so as to enable Premium Bonds to be sold at Post Offices.
attributes.additional_details: On one hand the Government are claiming that they want to take away the subsidy they make towards the Post Office network and on the other hand they are taking away vital business which helps to support the network.
attributes.background:
Recently the Government owned National Savings and Investments have made a decision to stop Premium Bonds being on sale at Post Offices.
I feel this is a backward step as it is taking away customer choice and also depriving Post Offices of much needed revenue and footfall.
